metadata.title: CVE-2024-24788 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A malformed DNS message in response to a query can cause the Lookupfunctions to get stuck in an infinite loop.

criterions.comment: golang-1.13 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
